title: Trump was wrong to seek to overturn Biden win, says Mike Pence
description: Mike Pence issues his strongest rebuttal of Donald Trump's claim over the 2021 election result.

title: Grand Theft Auto 6: Rockstar announces it is working on the game
description: The studio said development of the next entry in the Grand Theft Auto series is "well under way."

title: Combat drones: We are in a new era of warfare - here's why

title: Don Broco: How they topped this week's chart with last year's album

description: Moscow and Beijing release a statement showcasing agreement on a wide range of geopolitical issues.

title: Silverwood was under 'impossible strain', Thorpe leaves & Root to remain skipper

title: Six Nations: Wales-Ireland kit clash frustrates colour-blind fans
description: The decision to wear traditional red and green jerseys will cause problems for colour-blind people.

title: Backlash after Bank boss says don't ask for big pay rise

description: The election in Southend West was prompted by the fatal stabbing of MP Sir David Amess.

title: Children's mental health: Huge rise in severe cases, BBC analysis reveals

title: Carlisle modern slavery boss given suspended sentence

title: Energy price rise includes £68 for failed firms, says Ofgem

title: 'We'd be crazy not to be' - Klopp says Liverpool still keen on Fulham's Carvalho
description: Jurgen Klopp says Liverpool would "be crazy" if they were not still interested in Fulham's Fabio Carvalho after failing to seal a deadline-day deal.

title: Billionaire Bezos' superyacht sparks bridge row

description: Great Britain's mixed doubles curlers Jen Dodds and Bruce Mouat survive an Australia fightback to maintain their semi-final hopes.

title: Claressa Shields on fighting in the UK and Savannah Marshall possibility

title: Game of Thrones studio opens door to Westeros, in Northern Ireland

title: Libmeldy: World's 'most expensive' drug recommended for NHS use
